QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Burning Steppes!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to John J. Keeshan at Flamestar Post.$B$BYour aid is urgently needed to put an end to the Blackrock orc menace!$B$BYou can reach the Burning Steppes by traveling south from the Searing Gorge through Blackrock Mountain. Look for Flamestar Post on the far side of the mountain.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to John J. Keeshan at Flamestar Post in the Burning Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText: It's time for the Blackrock orcs to feel the full wrath of the Alliance. They will pay for what they've done.
